sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Creates a new task in the NeedIt task table assigned to the manager with the reason for closure in an attempt to get things resolved.

sys_element_mapping.value: short_description=NeedIt Task was not closed in a timely manner^description=Identify cause for overdue NeedIt Task ﻿{{subflow.needit_task.number}}^assigned_to={"display":"Fred Luddy","value":"5137153cc611227c000bbd1bd8cd2005","table":"sys_user","sys_id":"5137153cc611227c000bbd1bd8cd2005"}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Updates a record with a new State and Work Notes field. Allows automatic closure of tickets.
Leaves a log of the reason for the closure of the ticket.

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Assign a follow up task to the subflow output
